title: Motion of object projected up ramp

content.prompt: An object with initial velocity v0, as shown above, slides up and then down a long, frictionless, inclined plane. Which of the following is true of the object as it moves?

choices.label: It has a constant acceleration while moving up the plane and a greater acceleration when moving down the plane.
It has a constant acceleration while moving up the plane and a smaller acceleration when moving down the plane.
It moves with a constant velocity both up and down the plane.
It has the same acceleration as it moves up and down the plane.
It has a continually varying acceleration as it moves up and down the plane.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
